translation: Third Part, Third and Second Categories of Good Presentations

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法應如實覺名假、法假。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas cultivate the perfection of wisdom, they should truly perceive all things as nominal and dharmically nominal.

source_sentence: 「善現！
translation: "Good performance!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於一切法名假、法假如實覺已，不取著色，不取著受、想、行、識；不取著眼處、色處，不取著耳處、聲處，不取著鼻處、香處，不取著舌處、味處，不取著身處、觸處，不取著意處、法處；不取著眼界、色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著耳界、聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著鼻界、香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著舌界、味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著身界、觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著意界、法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂；不取著有為界，不取著無為界；不取著布施波羅蜜多，不取著淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；不取著名，不取著相；不取著菩薩身；不取著肉眼，不取著天眼、慧眼、法眼、佛眼；不取著智波羅蜜多，不取著神通波羅蜜多；不取著內空，不取著外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、無散空、本性空、相空、一切法空、無性空、無性自性空；不取著真如，不取著實際、法界；不取著成熟有情，不取著嚴淨佛土；不取著方便善巧。
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩於一切法名假、法假如實覺已，不取著色，不取著受、想、行、識；不取著眼處、色處，不取著耳處、聲處，不取著鼻處、香處，不取著舌處、味處，不取著身處、觸處，不取著意處、法處；不取著眼界、色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著耳界、聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著鼻界、香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著舌界、味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著身界、觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂，不取著意界、法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受若樂若苦若不苦不樂；不取著有為界，不取著無為界；不取著布施波羅蜜多，不取著淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；不取著名，不取著相；不取著菩薩身；不取著肉眼，不取著天眼、慧眼、法眼、佛眼；不取著智波羅蜜多，不取著神通波羅蜜多；不取著內空，不取著外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、無散空、本性空、相空、一切法空、無性空、無性自性空；不取著真如，不取著實際、法界；不取著成熟有情，不取著嚴淨佛土；不取著方便善巧。

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 以一切法若能取著、若所取著、若取著時、若取著處皆無所有。
translation: "It means that all things lack existence whether they are grasped, whether they are grasped, when they are grasped, or where they are grasped.

source_sentence: 「如是，善現！
translation: "So it is, good present!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於一切法無所取著修行般若波羅蜜多時，增長布施波羅蜜多，增長淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，趣入菩薩正決定位，能住菩薩不退轉地，圓滿菩薩殊勝神通。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas cultivate the perfection of wisdom without attaching to any dharmas, they increase the perfection of generosity, increase the perfection of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and the perfection of wisdom, enter the bodhisattva's correct and determined position, are able to abide in the bodhisattva's stage of nonretrogression, and perfect the bodhisattva's extraordinary supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 如是神通得圓滿已，從一佛國至一佛國，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊。
translation: After thus perfecting their supernormal powers, they go from one Buddha-land to another, making offerings to, honoring, and praising the world-honored buddhas.

source_sentence: 為欲成熟諸有情故，為欲嚴淨自佛土故，為見如來、應、正等覺，引發種種殊勝善根。
translation: Because they want to ripen sentient beings, because they want to purify their own Buddha-lands, and because they want to see the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Enlightened One, they will give rise to a variety of excellent good roots.

source_sentence: 既能引發勝善根已，隨所樂聞諸佛正法皆得聽受。
translation: Once they've arisen excellent good roots, they'll listen to and accept the correct teachings of the buddhas as they please.

source_sentence: 既聽受已，乃至安坐妙菩提座終不忘失，所受法門亦無間斷，普於一切陀羅尼門、三摩地門皆得自在。
translation: Once they've heard and accepted them, they never forget them even when they're sitting on the marvelous throne of enlightenment, and the teachings they've received are not interrupted, so they attain full mastery over all the dhāraṇī and samādhi teachings.

source_sentence: 如是，善現！
translation: Thus, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法能如實覺名假法假無所取著。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they can truly perceive all things as nominal and provisional, with no attachment whatsoever.

source_sentence: 佛告善現：「汝觀何義作如是言：即色等非菩薩，異色等非菩薩，非色等中有菩薩，非菩薩中有色等，非離色等有菩薩耶？」
translation: The Buddha told Śaṇḍinya, "What do you mean by observing and saying this, namely, that form and so forth are not bodhisattvas, that different forms and so forth are not bodhisattvas, that there are bodhisattvas in what is not form, that there are forms and so forth in what is not bodhisattvas, and that there are not bodhisattvas free from form and so forth?"

source_sentence: 善現答言：「世尊！
translation: The Śubha replied, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若菩提、若薩埵、若色等，尚畢竟無所有不可得故，況有菩薩！
translation: If bodhi, sattva, and form are ultimately nonexistent and unobtainable, how much more so if there are bodhisattvas!

source_sentence: 此既非有，如何可言：即色等是菩薩，異色等是菩薩，色等中有菩薩，菩薩中有色等，離色等有菩薩？」
translation: If this is not the case, how can it be said that form and so forth are bodhisattvas, that different forms and so forth are bodhisattvas, that there are bodhisattvas within form and so forth, that there are forms and so forth within bodhisattvas, and that there are bodhisattvas apart from forms and so forth?"

source_sentence: 佛告善現：「善哉！
translation: The Buddha told Śubhavyūha, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 如汝所說。
translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know it well in the present!

source_sentence: 若菩提、若薩埵、若色等不可得故，諸菩薩亦不可得。
translation: If bodhi, sattva, and form are unobtainable, then the bodhisattvas are also unobtainable.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩不可得故，所行般若波羅蜜多亦不可得。
translation: Because bodhisattvas can't attain them, the prajñāpāramitā that they practice can't attain them either.

source_sentence: 善現！

translation: Is it a bodhisattva who augments the words of the earth realm and even the consciousness realm, whether mundane or transmundane?

source_sentence: 地界乃至識界若雜染若清淨增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who speaks intensively about the defiled and pure elements of the earth realm and even the consciousness realm?

source_sentence: 地界乃至識界若屬生死若屬涅槃增語是菩薩耶？」
translation: If the element of earth or even consciousness is birth-and-death or nirvāṇa, are these additional words bodhisattvas?"

source_sentence: 善現答言：「不也！
translation: The Zenkai replied, "No!

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 於意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 言菩薩者，無明乃至老死增語是菩薩耶？
translation: If you say bodhisattva, is this the bodhisattva who speaks incrementally about nescience and even old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若常若無常增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Are nescience and even old age and death permanent and impermanent additions to the bodhisattva's vocabulary?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若樂若苦增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who speaks intensively about nescience and even old age and death, whether pleasant or painful?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若我若無我增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who augments the words "whether it's self or no-self" with regard to nescience or even old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若淨若不淨增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who increases his speech whether nescience or even old age and death are purified or impure?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若空若不空增語是菩薩耶？
translation: "If nescience and even old age and death are empty and nonempty, is this a bodhisattva who speaks intensively?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有相若無相增語是菩薩耶？
translation: "Is nescience ... [even] old age and death a bodhisattva if it's similar and markless in terms of increased speech?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有願若無願增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who augments the words with or without a wish, whether it's nescience or even old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若寂靜若不寂靜增語是菩薩耶？
translation: If nescience and even old age and death are quiescent and non-quiescent, is this a bodhisattva who speaks intensively?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若遠離若不遠離增語是菩薩耶？
translation: If nescience and even old age and death are isolated or not isolated, is this a bodhisattva who speaks intensively?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有為若無為增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who speaks intensively about nescience and even old age, whether existent or inactive?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有漏若無漏增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who increases his speech whether contaminated or uncontaminated, from nescience to old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若生若滅增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who increases his speech whether nescience or old age and death arise or cease?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若善若非善增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who incrementally speaks whether it's good or not good, from nescience to old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有罪若無罪增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Is it a bodhisattva who incrementally speaks whether there is guilt or no guilt in nescience or even in old age and death?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若有煩惱若無煩惱增語是菩薩耶？
translation: If there are afflictions or lack of afflictions in nescience and even in old age, is this a bodhisattva who adds words?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若世間若出世間增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Are nescience and even old age and death, whether mundane or transmundane, incremental words of a bodhisattva?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若雜染若清淨增語是菩薩耶？
translation: Are nescience and even old age, whether defiled or pure, augmented by language a bodhisattva?

source_sentence: 無明乃至老死若屬生死若屬涅槃增語是菩薩耶？」
translation: Is nescience ... old age and death, whether birth-and-death or nirvāṇa, a bodhisattva?"

source_sentence: 善現答言：「不也！
translation: The Zenkai replied, "No!

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 佛告善現：「汝觀何義作如是言：色等增語非菩薩？
translation: The Buddha addressed the Śākyamuni, "What is the meaning of your observation that makes you say this, 'Increasing speech about form and so forth is not bodhisattva?'

source_sentence: 復觀何義作如是言：色等法若常若無常增語、若樂若苦增語、若我若無我增語、若淨若不淨增語、若空若不空增語、若有相若無相增語、若有願若無願增語、若寂靜若不寂靜增語、若遠離若不遠離增語、若有為若無為增語、若有漏若無漏增語、若生若滅增語、若善若非善增語、若有罪若無罪增語、若有煩惱若無煩惱增語、若世間若出世間增語、若雜染若清淨增語、若屬生死若屬涅槃增語非菩薩耶？」
translation: "Furthermore, what is the point of observing and saying, 'Is it a bodhisattva to say that things such as form are permanent or impermanent, pleasant or painful, self or no-self, pure or impure, empty or not-empty, similar or not-identical, wishing or not-wishing, quiescent or not-quiescent, isolated or not-isolate, contaminated or not-contaminated, arisen or ceased, good or not-good, blameworthy or not-blameworthy, afflicted or not-afflicted, mundane or transmundane, defiled or pure, birth-and-death or nirvāṇa?'"

source_sentence: 善現答言：「世尊！
translation: The Śubha replied, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 色等法尚畢竟無所有不可得故，況有色等增語！
translation: It's because dharmas such as form are ultimately without existence and unknowable, so why wouldn't there be additional words such as form?

source_sentence: 此增語既非有，如何可言色等增語是菩薩？
translation: Since these intensifying words are not existent, how can it be said that intensifying words such as form are bodhisattvas?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 色等法尚畢竟無所有不可得故，況有色等若常若無常、若樂若苦、若我若無我、若淨若不淨、若空若不空、若有相若無相、若有願若無願、若寂靜若不寂靜、若遠離若不遠離、若有為若無為、若有漏若無漏、若生若滅、若善若非善、若有罪若無罪、若有煩惱若無煩惱、若世間若出世間、若雜染若清淨、若屬生死若屬涅槃！
translation: It's because such things as form are ultimately impermanent and inexistent, whether form is permanent or impermanent, pleasant or painful, self or no-self, pure or impure, empty or not empty, comparable or impermanent, desirable or not desirable, quiescent or not quiescent, isolated or not isolated, existent or not, contaminated or not contaminated, arising or ceasing, good or not good, guilty or not guilty, afflicted or not afflicted, mundane or transmundane, defiled or pure, subject to birth-and-death or subject to nirvāṇa!

source_sentence: 此既非有，況有色等法常無常增語，乃至屬生死屬涅槃增語！
translation: If this is not existent, how could it be that form and other things are permanent, impermanent, and superfluous, or that they belong to birth-and-death and nirvāṇa?

source_sentence: 此增語既非有，如何可言：色等法常無常增語是菩薩，乃至屬生死屬涅槃增語是菩薩？」
translation: Since this augmentation is not present, how can it be said that the augmentation of the permanence and impermanence of form and other things is bodhisattva, or even that the augmentation of birth-and-death and nirvāṇa is bodhisattva?"

source_sentence: 佛告善現：「善哉！
translation: The Buddha told Śubhavyūha, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 如汝所說。
translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know it well in the present!

source_sentence: 色等法及常無常等不可得故，色等法增語及常無常等增語亦不可得，法及增語不可得故，諸菩薩亦不可得，諸菩薩不可得故，所行般若波羅蜜多亦不可得。
translation: Because form and such things as form and impermanence and so forth are unobtainable, augmentative speech about form and such things as form and impermanence and so forth are also unobtainable, bodhisattvas are also unobtainable because form and augmentative speech are unobtainable, and the prajñāpāramitā that's practiced is also unobtainable because bodhisattvas are unobtainable.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於此義中當懃修學。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas cultivate the perfection of wisdom, they should diligently train in this meaning.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 汝先所言『不見有法可名菩薩摩訶薩。』
translation: What you first said was, 'I don't see a dharma that can be called a bodhisattva-mahāsattva.'

source_sentence: 者，如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如汝所說。
translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know it well in the present!

source_sentence: 諸法不見法界，法界不見諸法，諸法不見諸法，法界不見法界。
translation: "The Dharma doesn't see the Dharma realm, the Dharma realm doesn't see the Dharma, the Dharma doesn't see the Dharma, and the Dharma realm doesn't see the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know this well!

source_sentence: 色界不見法界，法界不見色界；受、想、行、識界不見法界，法界不見受、想、行、識界。
translation: The form realm doesn't see the Dharma realm, and the Dharma realm doesn't see the form realm; the feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness realms don't see the Dharma realm, and the Dharma realm doesn't see the feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness realms.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know this well!

source_sentence: 眼界不見法界，法界不見眼界；耳、鼻、舌、身、意界不見法界，法界不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界。
translation: The element of vision doesn't see the Dharma element, and the element of vision doesn't see the Dharma element; the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind elements don't see the Dharma element, and the Dharma element doesn't see the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind elements.

source_sentence: 色界不見法界，法界不見色界；聲、香、味、觸、法界不見法界，法界不見聲、香、味、觸、法界。
translation: The form realm doesn't see the Dharma realm, and the Dharma realm doesn't see the form realm; the sound, smell, taste, touch, and Dharma realms don't see the Dharma realm, and the Dharma realm doesn't see the sound, smell, taste, touch, and Dharma realms.

source_sentence: 眼識界不見法界，法界不見眼識界；耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界不見法界，法界不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界。
translation: The element of the visual consciousness doesn't see the Dharma element, and the element of the visual consciousness doesn't see the Dharma element; the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness don't see the Dharma element, and the Dharma element doesn't see the ear, nose, tongue, body, and consciousness element.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know this well!

source_sentence: 地界不見法界，法界不見地界；水、火、風、空、識界不見法界，法界不見水、火、風、空、識界。
translation: The element of earth doesn't see the element of reality, and the element of reality doesn't see the element of earth; the elements of water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness don't see the element of reality, and the element of reality doesn't see the elements of water, fire, wind, air, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know this well!

source_sentence: 有為界不見無為界，無為界不見有為界。
translation: The animate realm doesn't see the impermanent realm, and the impermanent realm doesn't see the animate realm.

source_sentence: 善現當知！
translation: You should know this well!

source_sentence: 非離有為界可施設無為界，非離無為界可施設有為界。
translation: It's not possible to define the realm of nonexistence apart from the realm of existence, and it's not possible to define the realm of existence apart from the realm of nonexistence.

source_sentence: 「如是，善現！
translation: "So it is, good present!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法都無所見，無所見故，其心不驚不恐不怖，於一切法心不沈沒亦不憂悔。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they see nothing of all things, and because they see nothing, their minds aren't startled or frightened or terrified, and their thoughts aren't submerged in all things, and they don't regret them.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩如是修行甚深般若波羅蜜多時，不見色，不見受、想、行、識；不見眼處，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；不見色處，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處；不見眼界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界；不見色界，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界；不見眼識界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界；不見地界，不見水、火、風、空、識界；不見無明，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死；不見貪欲，不見瞋恚、愚癡；不見我，不見有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者；不見欲界，不見色、無色界；不見聲聞及聲聞法，不見獨覺及獨覺法，不見菩薩及菩薩法，不見如來及如來法；不見菩提，不見涅槃。
translation: 是菩薩摩訶薩如是修行甚深般若波羅蜜多時，不見色，不見受、想、行、識；不見眼處，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處；不見色處，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處；不見眼界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界；不見色界，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界；不見眼識界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界；不見地界，不見水、火、風、空、識界；不見無明，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死；不見貪欲，不見瞋恚、愚癡；不見我，不見有情、命者、生者、養者、士夫、補特伽羅、意生、儒童、作者、受者、知者、見者；不見欲界，不見色、無色界；不見聲聞及聲聞法，不見獨覺及獨覺法，不見菩薩及菩薩法，不見如來及如來法；不見菩提，不見涅槃。

source_sentence: 如是，善現！
translation: Thus, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法都無所見，無所見時，其心不驚不恐不怖，於一切法心不沈沒亦不憂悔。」
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they see nothing in all things, and when they see nothing, their minds aren't startled or frightened or terrified, and their minds aren't sunken or distressed about all things."

source_sentence: 爾時，具壽善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the life-size Good Samaritan said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，何因緣故，於一切法心不沈沒亦不憂悔？」
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, what are the reasons why their minds aren't submerged in all phenomena and they don't regret them?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「善現！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，普於一切心及心所無見無得，由是因緣，於一切法心不沈沒亦不憂悔。」
translation: When bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and practitioners of the perfection of wisdom, their minds and mental factors are invisible and unobtainable; as a result, their minds aren't sunken or distressed about all things."

source_sentence: 具壽善現復白佛言：「何因緣故，諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法其心不驚不恐不怖？」
translation: Guoshou Shancheng then said to the Buddha, "What are the causes and conditions that cause bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and practitioners of the perfection of wisdom to not be frightened or afraid of or terrified about all dharmas?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「善現！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，普於一切意界及意識界無見無得。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, they see nothing and attain nothing in all realms of mind and consciousness.

source_sentence: 如是，善現！
translation: Thus, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切法其心不驚不恐不怖。
translation: When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom, their minds aren't startled or frightened by or afraid of all things.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於一切法無見無得，應行般若波羅蜜多。
translation: "All bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, should practice the perfection of wisdom when they see nothing and attain nothing about all things.

source_sentence: 謂於色無見無得，於受、想、行、識無見無得；於眼處無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無見無得；於色處無見無得，於聲、香、味、觸、法處無見無得；於眼界無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界無見無得；於色界無見無得，於聲、香、味、觸、法界無見無得；於眼識界無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無見無得；於眼觸無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無見無得；於眼觸為緣所生諸受無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受無見無得；於地界無見無得，於水、火、風、空、識界無見無得；於無明無見無得，於行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死無見無得；於布施波羅蜜多無見無得，於淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無見無得；於內空無見無得，於外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、無散空、本性空、相空、一切法空、無性空、無性自性空無見無得；於真如無見無得，於法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際無見無得；於四念住無見無得，於四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支無見無得；於苦聖諦無見無得，於集、滅、道聖諦無見無得；於四靜慮無見無得，於四無量、四無色定無見無得；於八解脫無見無得，於八勝處、九次第定、十遍處無見無得；於空解脫門無見無得，於無相、無願解脫門無見無得；於一切陀羅尼門無見無得，於一切三摩地門無見無得；於極喜地無見無得，於離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地無見無得；於五眼無見無得，於六神通無見無得；於佛十力無見無得，於四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法無見無得；於三十二大士相無見無得，於八十隨好無見無得；於無忘失法無見無得，於恒住捨性無見無得；於一切智無見無得，於道相智、一切相智無見無得；於預流果無見無得，於一來、不還、阿羅漢果無見無得；於獨覺菩提無見無得，於一切菩薩摩訶薩行無見無得，於諸佛無上正等菩提無見無得。
translation: 謂於色無見無得，於受、想、行、識無見無得；於眼處無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無見無得；於色處無見無得，於聲、香、味、觸、法處無見無得；於眼界無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界無見無得；於色界無見無得，於聲、香、味、觸、法界無見無得；於眼識界無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無見無得；於眼觸無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無見無得；於眼觸為緣所生諸受無見無得，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受無見無得；於地界無見無得，於水、火、風、空、識界無見無得；於無明無見無得，於行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死無見無得；於布施波羅蜜多無見無得，於淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無見無得；於內空無見無得，於外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、無散空、本性空、相空、一切法空、無性空、無性自性空無見無得；於真如無見無得，於法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際無見無得；於四念住無見無得，於四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支無見無得；於苦聖諦無見無得，於集、滅、道聖諦無見無得；於四靜慮無見無得，於四無量、四無色定無見無得；於八解脫無見無得，於八勝處、九次第定、十遍處無見無得；於空解脫門無見無得，於無相、無願解脫門無見無得；於一切陀羅尼門無見無得，於一切三摩地門無見無得；於極喜地無見無得，於離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地無見無得；於五眼無見無得，於六神通無見無得；於佛十力無見無得，於四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法無見無得；於三十二大士相無見無得，於八十隨好無見無得；於無忘失法無見無得，於恒住捨性無見無得；於一切智無見無得，於道相智、一切相智無見無得；於預流果無見無得，於一來、不還、阿羅漢果無見無得；於獨覺菩提無見無得，於一切菩薩摩訶薩行無見無得，於諸佛無上正等菩提無見無得。

source_sentence: 如是，善現！
translation: Thus, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於一切法無見無得，應行般若波羅蜜多。
translation: All bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, who have no views or apprehensions of all things, should practice the perfection of wisdom.

source_sentence: 「復次，善現！
translation: "Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行般若波羅蜜多時，於一切處及一切時，不得般若波羅蜜多，不得般若波羅蜜多名；不得菩薩摩訶薩，不得菩薩摩訶薩名。
translation: When bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas cultivate prajñāpāramitā, they don't obtain prajñāpāramitā or prajñāpāramitā in all places and at all times, and they don't obtain the names of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, or bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 善現！
translation: Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 應如是教誡教授諸菩薩摩訶薩，令於般若波羅蜜多得至究竟。」
translation: Thus should you instruct and teach the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas so that they will attain the ultimate realization of the perfection of prajñāpāramitā."

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第四百八十三
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra, Vol. 483
